connector.description: Consume files from Azure Storage Blob.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source.period
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..description: The interval (in milliseconds) between fetches to the Azure Storage Container.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source.accountName
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..description: The Azure Storage Blob account name.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source.containerName
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..description: The Azure Storage Blob container name.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source.accessKey
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..description: The Azure Storage Blob access key.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source.credentialType
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-source..description: Determines the credential strategy to adopt. Possible values are SHARED_ACCOUNT_KEY, SHARED_KEY_CREDENTIAL and AZURE_IDENTITY
